experience: You and Alexa both know Robert Coffey
"How you climb a mountain is more important than reaching the top." - Yvon Chouinard, founder of Patagonia
Remember to connect with people now and then. In fact, pick up the phone, right now, and call a friend for no other reason than to say hi.
A culture is strong when people work with each other, for each other. A culture is weak when people work against each other, for themselves.
We must all try to empathize before we criticize. Ask someone what's wrong before telling them they are wrong.
When you speak, what is your perspective? Is the audience in service of you or are you in service to them? The greatest fulfillment can be found in giving ourselves so that others may benefit.
Want to put these tips into action? Learn to Speak Like A Leader live with our team. Deadline to apply is tonight at midnight. http://bit.ly/2gNNe6y
Relationship is the foundation of accomplishment.
Vice President, Institutional Asset Management Group, Retirement Business Development Officer

Responsible for developing and identifying large complex opportunities for retirement solutions group product sales to institutional clients and prospects including sales of PNC Funds.  Utilizing a consultative approach coupled with strategic planning focused on  all types of retirement plans .
Assistant Vice President, New Business Development Officer

BB&T Sterling Award Winner, Q1 & Q3 2015. Retirement and Institutional sales and relationship management solutions for corporations, non-profit organizations, and government entities.  Investment Advisory and Asset Management.  Covering state of Floridawithin BB&T footprint. Coordinate with appropriate Regional and Market Presidents in addition to banking officers to insure maximum institutional market penetration. Develop and maintain prospect lists through internal and external center of influence sources.Develop, plan, organize, and schedule calling activities to produce sales of institutional 401k and 403b solutions to clients; Refer other BB&T partners when appropriate. Cultivate relationships with appropriate centers of influence who refer business to BB&T Institutional Services, such as attorneys, CPA's, and other industry professionals.  Promote BB&T Institutional Services through relationship building and presentations to internal and external groups; represent the bank in civic, community, government, banking, and professional groups.

Specialties: RFP Provider Search & Benchmarking, Contract & Fee Negotiations, Investment Due Diligence, Advisor Benchmarking, ERISA Compliance, Fiduciary Compliance, Behavioral Finance, Investments, Plan Design & Compliance, Defined Contribution Plans, Investment Committee Best Practices, Employee Education and Communication, Retirement Income Solutions.Assist Plan Sponsors in evaluating and improving retirement plans.  Specialties: 401(k) plans, Profit-Sharing, 403(b) plans, 457 Plans, Plan Design, Fiduciary Process, Education Strategies, Plan Design, Non Qualified plans, ESOPs and Defined Benefit plans.

recommendations: Raquel Medina
Director, SAP Cloud Customer Organization, Midwest Region at SAP Success Factors
June 10, 2016, Raquel worked with Alexa in the same group

I have had the distinct pleasure and good fortune to work with Raquel Medina at both ADP Retirement Services and The Principal Financial Group.  Raquel's many talents include her inherent foresight, client focus, ability to always get the best out of her team.  Raquel always delivers on sales and client satisfaction goals.  Her tenacity, strong work ethic, leadership skills and keen decision making abilities made Raquel not only a stellar asset to the organizations with which we were associated but also helped drive, develop and shape me into a much better sales professional.  She is a powerful and valuable addition to any team.

Heidi Padilla
Director of Insightful Solutions
September 10, 2013, Alexa worked with Heidi but at different companies

I highly recommend Heidi Padilla. I have the distinct pleasure of partnering directly with her for the benefit of many mutual clients.  Heidi's tremendous abilities never cease to amaze me. Heidi's incredible adaptability with potential clients has helped her excel in the competitive payroll sales world. Her uncanny ability to know what the client wants before they tell her makes customers feel comfortable with her.   Heidi's great connection with her customers and prospects in addition to her relentless perseverance to always satisfy the customer  makes her an indispensable business partner for me.With her abilities, adaptability, and dedication, Heidi will make a great partner for any team. I have no doubts you will be exceptionally pleased if you work with Heidi. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact me at 954-232-0744 or via email at ap@legacyrpa.com.  Sincerely,Alexa PhillipsLegacy Retirement Plan Advisors

summary: As an employer and employee advocate, Alexa Phillips specializes in helping employers design, implement and monitor successful retirement plans. Over the past twenty years, Alexa has helped over one thousand clients improve their employer sponsored retirement plan.Areas of focus include: ERISA plans, customized solutions, plan fiduciary risk assessment, strategic plan design and navigating the investment due diligence process, fee benchmarking and employee education. Beginning her financial services career at one of the top three largest mutual fund Families this renowned financial services firm allowed Alexa the opportunity to specialize in retirement plan sales. Over more than two decades, Alexa has established a reputation of excellence and expertise in pension services.  She has been a resource in the retirement plan services community, adding value by: partnering with advisors, mentoring and coaching, leading workshops, participating in expert panels, holding seminars, and participating in industry events.Specialties: RFP Provider Search & Benchmarking, Contract & Fee Negotiations, Investment Due Diligence, Advisor Benchmarking, ERISA Compliance, Fiduciary Compliance, Behavioral Finance, Investments, Plan Design & Compliance, Defined Contribution Plans, Investment Committee Best Practices, Employee Education and Communication, Retirement Income Solutions.
